message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $18,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, the product is worth significantly more to me.  Could you consider $15,000?
I understand that the product is valuable to you, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
